alert.note: Alert for Harper; Kingman; Reno (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 21 at 6:55AM CDT until June 21 at 8:00AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 AM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN RENO...NORTHERN HARPER AND KINGMAN COUNTIES... At 653 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles east of Turon to 6 miles southeast of Cunningham to Isabel, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotter reported 70 mph winds at Penalosa. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Kingman, Anthony, Harper, Attica, Norwich, Cunningham, Turon, Nashville, Murdock, Willowdale, Zenda, Spivey, Cleveland, Danville, Penalosa, Freeport, Kingman Airport, Rago, Runnymede and Crystal Springs. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
